scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r jsdom-global/register --file src/setupTests.ts --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts" "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:file: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r jsdom-global/register --file src/setupTests.ts --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts"
scripts.test:file:nosetup: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r jsdom-global/register -r ts-node/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts"
